text: Recover EP is the first extended play album by Scottish synth-pop band Chvrches. It was released in 25 March 2013. == Recover (song) == In 2013, Chvrches released a song called Recover, It was the second single from their debut studio album The Bones of What You Believe. It reached number 91 in the UK Singles Chart. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:Chvrches albums
title: Recover EP
